summary: Parses multipart/form-data request bodies per RFC 2388, streaming the input in configurable chunks and separating standard form fields from uploaded files into distinct multi-value dictionaries, while handling browser-specific quirks and managing temporary file resources.
business_intent: Provide web applications with a reliable, memoryâ€‘efficient way to process HTTP multipart/form-data submissions, especially large file uploads, and expose the extracted data in a structured format for further handling.
